\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{\mathscr{A}^{\mathbb N^{\mathrm{op}}}} && {\mathbf{Ab}^{\mathbb N^{\mathrm{op}}}} \\
	{\mathscr A} && {\mathbf{Ab}}
	\arrow["{F:= (X,-)}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{G:=\varprojlim }"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{G:=\varprojlim }", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{F:= (X,-)}"', from=2-1, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
